product.name: Tarnished Destroyed Sweater
product.mainDescription: Heavyweight organic cotton fleece sweatshirt in grey melange. Featuring Tarnished embroidery on the front. High quality destroyed effect for a unique vintage look. Raw hem. Oversized fit.

content.text: Designed for an oversize fit.
Take your normal size to achieve the model look, those in between sizes or smaller in frame might consider taking a size down as the garment is naturally oversized.
It does not have a ribbed hem so it will be more longline on the body.
Male model is 186 cm & wears a size M.
Female model is 177 cm & wears a size M.

content.title: Organic Cotton Jersey
content.description: Organic Cotton consumes less water and energy than traditional cotton, and uses no pesticides or harmful fertilizers. Jersey cotton is a soft, stretchy, naturally absorbent, breathable, wrinkle-resistant, and low-maintenance material.

material.sentence: 100% {{Recycled polyamide}} with GRS certification made in Italy (from Olmetex) Ã¢â¬â water repellent, sublimation allover print

content.title: OLMETEX Recycled Polyamide
content.description: Polyamide is a synthetic material, patented in the 1930s by the famous American company Du Pont. It is also known as Nylon. Recycled polyamide is made from either fabric waste, industrial fishing nets, or carpets.

material.title: OLMETEX Recycled Polyamide

material.label: ZIP
material.sentence: T8 aluminium finish zip (from {{Lampo}}) at centre front

content.title: LAMPO Zippers
content.smallDescription: Iconic zippers made in Italy. Since 1887.
content.description: LAMPO is the international reference player in the fashion zip industry. Since 1887, the company has established itself as a key leader in zipper quality and innovation. In addition to expertise, excellence and product engineering, LAMPO also focuses on enhancing human know-how, developing creativity and protecting the environment.

material.title: LAMPO Zippers
